page.title: 12Two Local Industries
page.content: {The Currys'training centre}at Easton is a large, old house. Its purpose is for the training of managers who work for the company. The managers can be either trainees or established personel. They usually go to the centre for up to a week and live there during this time. The centre has a studio used for making TV adverts and another area used for CCTV work. The CCTV system is used to record how managers perform during the training. It can be played back to show good and bad points. Management training should be a continuous process hence the need for a training centre.{Condor}is an engineering firm which has its production plant and head offices in Winchester. The company makes things like petrol station canopies, prefabricated buildings and sewage plants.
